name: Node.JS Application2
description: This is a Node.js application container setup. It supports a variety of startup configurations and is ideal for running Node.js servers or applications.
author: info@kanus.io

variables.name: Startup Command 1
variables.description: First command used to start the server. This is executed by default.

variables.name: Startup Command 2
variables.description: Optional second startup command. If provided, this will be executed instead of the first command.

variables.name: NODE_ENV
variables.description: Sets the Node.js environment mode (e.g., development, production).
